snippet: As children’s books, just like all the other ones, migrate to digital media, parents, pediatricians and researchers are struggling to find out if reading an e-book should be considered story time.
abstract: Parents, pediatricians and researchers are struggling to answer whether reading books on tablets to children count as story time or screen time as books increasingly migrate to digital media; part of problem of finding an answer is the newness of tablets and e-readers.
lead_paragraph: As children’s books, just like all the other ones, migrate to digital media, parents, pediatricians and researchers are struggling to find out if reading an e-book should be considered story time.

headline.main: Is E-Reading to Your Toddler Story Time, or Simply Screen Time?
headline.print_headline: Is E-Reading to Your Toddler Story Time, or Simply Screen Time?
